text: You can format it with the datetimeformat filter

Hey all, I have a local module which I would like to be able to include some global content.
I setup a global module with some fields in, then setup a global partial, including the global module.
Then called the global partial in my local module.

However the global module doesnt get outputted.

the partial works in that if I just have it output some text, it is outputted where I call the partial. So presumably it's an issue with trying to call the global module.
that is not possible to include modules within modules
